DOC.brief_summary: The objective multi-center collaborative study ascertain frequency specific copy number variant ( CNVs ) identify prenatally evaluate detail continue follow-up child phenotype associate CNVs know uncertain clinical significance .
DOC.detailed_description: Specifically aim follow : 1 . Determine intellectual function child age 3 year 2 . Determine phenotypic characteristic intellectual function child age 3 year 3 . Determine frequency specific copy number variant discover routine prenatal diagnostic test 4 . Evaluate educational , counsel psychosocial implication microarray test introduce standard prenatal diagnostic procedure .
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria Enrollment 3 year Followup Cohort Inclusion Criteria 1 . Singleton multifetal pregnancy prenatal invasive procedure result diagnosis microarray analysis microdeletion/duplication le 10 Mbs , either pathogenic uncertain significance , report patient . This include : Infants diagnose prenatal diagnostic study perform the10 prespecified prenatal diagnostic center Infants diagnose analysis microarrays perform collaborate laboratory Infants refer Prenatal Microarray Resource Center website Children le 3 year age prenatally detect CNV < 10 Mbs , either pathogenic uncertain significance OR 2 . Children whose mother enrol initial study ( July 2011 ) meet inclusion criterion followup phase , refer `` Index cohort '' . This include : CNVs uncertain know significance , report patient Mosaic finding karyotype and/or microarray alone . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Patient refusal allow infant followup age three 2 . Patient fluent English language 3 . Patient age 18 4 . In surrogate pregnancy , `` rear parent '' unavailable give consent .
